content: शब(व)ल {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Spotted, brindled, variegated; क्वचित्प्रभा चांद्रमसी तमोभिश्र्छायाविलीनैः शबलीकृतेव <ls>R. 13. 56</ls>, <ls n="R.">5. 44</ls>; <ls>Mv. 7. 26.</ls> {@--2@} Varied, divided into various parts. {@--3@} Articulate; imitative. --लः A variegated colour. --ला, --ली {@--1@} A spotted or brindled cow. {@--2@} The cow of plenty or Kāmadhenu <ab>q. v.</ab> --लं Water.
